name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior SAP Engineer, I bring 8 years of comprehensive experience in troubleshooting, configuration, and root-cause analysis within enterprise environments. My strong analytical skills and problem-solving abilities have enabled me to deliver process improvements that enhance system performance and user satisfaction.

I possess excellent communication and collaboration skills, allowing me to work effectively with cross-functional teams to drive successful project outcomes. With a robust understanding of **SAP** technologies and methodologies, I am dedicated to optimizing payroll processes in the UK market and resolving complex issues efficiently.

Alongside my expertise in SAP, I have a history of building high-performance solutions in the healthcare and financial sectors, utilizing modern **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. My technical experience encompasses full-stack development with **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, as well as extensive work with cloud services including **Azure** and **AWS**. I have led the development of platforms integrating AI/ML for predictive analytics, and have a strong foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation, ensuring robust and secure application development.
